channel.title: Need help with Codes!
channel.description: hi, with have just started a server, me and my mate were are just getting used to what and where everything is. But coding is really anoying. we have a deltascape client. we dont have our own :s . When i ::jail username. i couldnt ::unjail username. either deltascape hasnt got or idk. will some tell us some codes please. AND WHERE TO PUT THEM, we just need an idea of where putting codes into it. this would really help us out alot. thanks rhys. ASAP :D

item.title: Need help with Codes!

doesnt work. anyone else no where to put it or know right codes???

item.title: Need help with Codes!
item.dc:creator: @Tylerholmes Tylerholmes
item.description:
@Tylerholmes wrote:

Okay, Say You Have

[code]if(command.startsWith(“spec”) && playerRights > 2){
specialAmount += 5000;
specAttack();
}

if (command.startsWith(“ipban”) && playerRights > 2) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(6);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

                if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                    client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];

		p.writeLog(p.playerLastConnect, "ipbans");
		p.disconnected = true;
		sM("You have ipbanned "+p.playerName+"!");
                } else { 
                   sM("The name doesnt exist."); 
                }
            } catch (Exception e) { 
                sM("Try entering a name you want to ip ban..");
            }
        }

[/code]

You Would want To Paste Between:

if(command.startsWith("spec") && playerRights > 2){ specialAmount += 5000; specAttack(); }

And

[code]if (command.startsWith(“ipban”) && playerRights > 2) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(6);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

                if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                    client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];

		p.writeLog(p.playerLastConnect, "ipbans");
		p.disconnected = true;
		sM("You have ipbanned "+p.playerName+"!");
                } else { 
                   sM("The name doesnt exist."); 
                }
            } catch (Exception e) { 
                sM("Try entering a name you want to ip ban..");
            }
        }[/code]

But Anyhow, Back To The Unjail Code, Here It Is.
Made It Custom For You!

if (command.startsWith("unjail") && playerRights >= 2) { try { String otherPName = command.substring(7); int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName); if (otherPIndex != -1) { client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex]; p.toX = 3088; p.toY = 3500; p.action = 0; p.sM("You have been unjailed by " + playerName); sM ("You have unjailed "+p.playerName+"."); checkDupe(); } else { sM("The name doesnt exist."); } } catch (Exception e) { sM("Try entering a name you want to unjail.."); } }

Just Copy And Paste The Unjail Code, And Do What I Said.

Read full topic
